title: Mad Men Logo / Title Font
content:
I'm looking to know the logo / title font as well as the accompanying text here.

All help appreciated!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150306061222im_/http:/typophile.com/files/LogoForTypophileMadMen_3891.jpg)
author: indie_uxyz

comments.content:
Give this image to 'WhatTheFont' at 'MyFonts.com' and you'll get a couple close matches.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150306061222im_/http:/typophile.com/files/MadMen_5758.jpg)

AT Triumvirate Condensed Black  
Trade Gothic Bold

A guess would be something similar to [Trade Gothic Next Heavy Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20150306061222/http:/www.identifont.com/find?font=Trade+Gothic+next+heavy+condensed&q=Go)

In a pinch you could use 'Helvetica Black Condensed'.
